title: Failed to conncect to server
body: Everything works fine normally but occasionally, I have the problem of "failed to connect to the server" after champion select, I tried every method from the support page but the doesn't help at all, I am now placed on a lower priority queue due as I am recognised as a leaver. In fact, it is the random problem of connecting to the server that lead to the problem. This adversely affects my gaming experience as I have to wait a much longer time before every game starts and I lost my LP for no reason. I hope this problem could be solved ASAP as it really affects my experience on this game. ty.

replies.body:
It sounds like your network is having issues reaching the game server.  A leave and loss of LP would happen if you aren't able to get into the game, so it may be best to stick to custom games for testing purposes.  If the connection guide hasn't helped, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a closer look with you.

Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to collect some logs for context, and attach it to the ticket.  We'll see you there!
